member.name: T:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Attributes.DataClassificationAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to mark properties with their data classification level. Classification drives display and audit requirements, while tenant policies control actual protection.

member.name: P:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Attributes.DataClassificationAttribute.Classification
member.summary: The classification level of the data

member.name: P:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Attributes.DataClassificationAttribute.Purpose
member.summary: Optional purpose or context for the field (e.g., "Identity", "Contact", "Financial") Used for compliance mapping and audit categorization

member.name: M:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Attributes.DataClassificationAttribute.#ctor(NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new DataClassificationAttribute

member.name: T:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification
member.summary: Data classification levels aligned with Australian Government PSPF/ISM standards

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification.Unofficial
member.summary: Public, non-government data that can be freely shared

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification.Official
member.summary: Routine government business information

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification.OfficialSensitive
member.summary: Sensitive information including PII and commercially sensitive data Requires enhanced protection measures

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification.Protected
member.summary: High-value information requiring strong access controls Includes financial data, health records, legal documents

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification.Secret
member.summary: National security information (not used in POA)

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.DataClassification.TopSecret
member.summary: Highest classification level (not used in POA)

member.name: T:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction
member.summary: Defines the action to take when purging data based on retention policy

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction.Delete
member.summary: Completely remove the record from the database

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction.Anonymize
member.summary: Replace sensitive data with anonymous values

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction.Archive
member.summary: Move data to cold storage/archive

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction.ReduceAccuracy
member.summary: Reduce data accuracy (e.g., keep only year from date of birth)

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction.CryptoShred
member.summary: Crypto-shred by destroying encryption keys

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeAction.SoftDelete
member.summary: Mark as deleted but retain for compliance

member.name: T:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeStrategy
member.summary: Defines when and how data purging should occur

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeStrategy.Immediate
member.summary: Purge immediately when retention period expires

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeStrategy.Scheduled
member.summary: Purge during scheduled maintenance window

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeStrategy.OnDemand
member.summary: Purge only when manually triggered

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeStrategy.Batched
member.summary: Purge in batches to minimize performance impact

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.PurgeStrategy.Never
member.summary: Never purge (regulatory requirement)

member.name: T:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern
member.summary: Defines how sensitive data should be redacted for display

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.Full
member.summary: Fully redacted: ****

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowFirst
member.summary: Show first character: J***

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowLast
member.summary: Show last character: ***n

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowFirstLast
member.summary: Show first and last: J***n

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowFirstThree
member.summary: Show first three characters: Joh***

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowDomain
member.summary: Show domain only for emails: ***@example.com

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowYear
member.summary: Show year only for dates: **/**/1990

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.ShowLastFour
member.summary: Show last four digits: ****1234

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.RedactionPattern.Custom
member.summary: Custom pattern defined by tenant policy

member.name: T:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy
member.summary: Defines the search strategy for tokenized fields

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.None
member.summary: No search capability for this field

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.Exact
member.summary: Exact match only using full value hash

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.Prefix
member.summary: Prefix search with progressive tokens (1-5 characters)

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.Phonetic
member.summary: Phonetic search using Soundex/Metaphone for name variations

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.Fuzzy
member.summary: Fuzzy search with edit distance tolerance

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.FullText
member.summary: Full-text search (only for unencrypted fields)

member.name: F:NumbatWallet.SharedKernel.Enums.SearchStrategy.ExactAndPrefix
member.summary: Combination of exact and prefix
